description: No need to wait for someone else to make first tracks. Keen gave their waterproof winter boots for men a higher profile for deeper powder and their warmest insulation (rated to -40°F), plus better grip for snow and ice.
name: Keen Revel IV High Polar - Mens

specs.value: A proprietary waterproof, breathable membrane that lets vapor out without letting water in
Their signature insulation is extremely compressible and light for the foot warmth it provides, and it retains its insulating ability, even when damp
